mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltPrcsNtslInfoMapper.deleteFcltPrcsNtslInfo */ TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC AOP SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND AOP.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr} AND AOP.APC_CD = #{apcCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltPrcsNtslInfoMapper.selectFcltPrcsNtslInfoRawDataList */ AOP.CRTR_YR , AOP.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = AOP.APC_CD) AS APC_NM
, (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV',CTPV_CD) FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = AOP.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = AOP.CRTR_YR ) AS CTPV_NM
, (SELECT X.CD_VL_EXPLN FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL X WHERE 1=1 AND X.CD_ID = 'UNTY_SGG' AND X.APC_CD = '0000' AND X.CD_VL = (SELECT SIGUN_CD FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = AOP.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = AOP.CRTR_YR) ) AS SIGUN_NM
, AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_LGSZ_RTL , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_FOOD_MTRL , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_WHLSL_MRKT , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_BZENTY , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_EXPRT , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_HMSP , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_B2B , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_B2C , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ETC , AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_WHLSL_MRKT
, ( NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_LGSZ_RTL,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_FOOD_MTRL,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_WHLSL_MRKT,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_BZENTY,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_EXPRT,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_HMSP,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_B2B,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_B2C,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ETC,0) + NVL(AOP.APC_NTSL_AMT_ONLN_WHLSL_MRKT,0) ) AS APC_NTSL_AMT_TOT
FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC AOP WHERE 1=1 AND AOP.APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND AOP.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND AOP.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY AOP.CRTR_YR , APC_NM
